WRITING.TEXT: Why is it transparent and brown? What is the significance of this color scheme?
Count me.

He prefaces that statement with a tale about some wife beating scumbag who he could have killed, but let off with a "Mike warning", who came back and killed his wife.
I feel like that is the half measure he was referencing.
Maybe I'm crazy...
Wait... Her name isn't Shaniqua??

Totally. I prefer TV Shane to TV Rick any day of the week. I wish their situation had ended the other way around. No way Rick's skinny ass ever could have whooped Shane's ass were it not for poor scripting (let's not talk about Tyrone...). Rick was not the better character of the two. Tradition be damned. Shane's WD crew would have conquered the Southeast in two seasons. Shane would have become President Biff "Scarface" Walsh, and Carl would have loved his badass Pappy until the end of fucking time.

The suits in Iron Man 3 were MODULAR. They weren't a one piece suit, they were many seperate sections that came together to make suits. Without a single solid frame to hold the sections together, these suits suffer from joint weakness in every place that two or more sections come together.
Like a pair of Whitey-Tighties worn for three weeks in Tijuana.

Solid Snake was trained by Miller to date Venom. Not simply take him out. This plan went to shit when Solid Snake found out that he couldn't take anyone over the age of 20 to Prom. It was then that Miller said "fuggit", and trained Snake to kill people.

Brah, of you run that "warped" feed through a VR headset, it looks just like it did for the hombre who was playing in first person. Totally right about any value in some bullshit like that. Only wimps and losers would think something like that would ever be cool. Shh'yah... Bruh.

Damn, paint him silver and drop a helmet on his nugget. He looks like Megatron.
Amazed.

WRITING.TITLE: This is day 4 of year 1 A.B.
WRITING.TEXT: That's how my calendar is gonna work from here on...
Yeah, I'd prefer to never find myself with such an illustrious title. Good luck, Mayng!

I wish for three things right now.
1. I wish I were a rentboy. 2. ... and that you would accept the services of a rentboy for payment. 3. ...and that the services of a rentboy could be delivered via mail.
Epic collection. Wish I had the cheese. Thats a terrific bargain.
If thing don't work out, and you consider parting this lot out, I'd love to chat about that duo...
She has wide, child bearing hips. Will make Mama proud. Take her home!
Smoke is Leia.
Starfleet Granny, is that a huge fucking dick under there, or are you shoplifting bananas again?
Buy three. One to keep boxed, one to display in bot mode, and one to show off in alt mode. Combiners? Get four.
Ex - motherfucking - zactly.
Deception equivalent to Grimlock.

Honored! You steamy beast. Someday, some lucky fucker is gonna lay you down on a fresh loaf of deli bread and slather your spicy ass in some artisan mayo. I'm sure you hear this all the time, but have you considered porn?
My instant urge is to objectify this smolerding slab of white hot fuck. Am I a bad person?

Holy shit, you're right! I think the US Treasury has been staring at their copy of Low for a while too. Have you noticed how they portray dead Presidents on bills and coins? No way is this coincidence. Bowie did everything first. EVERYTHING!
Groo
The cassette tray opens like a microwave door. My guess; third world animation team, little to no real world experience with a walkman-type device. Or, lazy. Maybe just shit skills and zero talent.
I agree. This game severely lacked in the "boss experience" department.

Well, if you pay attention to the multiple storylines in this game, you notice that something was building towards an epic climax between Eli, that ginger kid, and Sehalanthropus, but this kinda just went nowhere after those kids took what appears to be the series most advanced model of Metal Gear and ran off to God knows where. Next time we see Eli and Ginger they are grown up and scamming Solid Snake into activating a less formidable Metal Gear. Sehalanthropus is never spoken of again. In all Metal Gear titles to date, the game has ended only after the destruction of said titular walking tank, and many times a satisfying one-on-one battle.
Then there's that video of "Mission 51" which lays out exactly what was cut and underlines the fact that we didn't get a completed story.
Why did he sound like Billy Bob Thornton? WHY?!

Hmmm... I've not tried in an actual building, but under the roofs of shacks, and under overhangs, this works like a charm. This and calling in a sandstorm make armored infantry and tank missions a snap.
Yes!
Nope. Works anywhere and everywhere DD can reach an incapacitated dude. No weapons, vehicles, or containers though.
